entry.title: Happy birthday
entry.summary:
Today we celebrate two years developing. A year ago, we summarized up the results for the year. We wrote the following:

The work does not stop, but the pace is increasing more and more, and in a year there will be great results

And then a challengin...

entry.title: What's new
entry.summary: The last two weeks were tough for us. We stabilized our backend service and finished all the rest tasks. During work, we found little bugs and inaccuracies, which successfully fixed. Now we almost ready to publish binary executable files of our proje...

entry.title: First step
entry.summary:
Neil Armstrong said:

That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind

Our project is certainly not as grand as the conquest of the moon. But we are taking our first step and hope for your support. Our story began on May 14, 2018, I starte...
